duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate new hire onboarding activities, such as preparing paperwork, conducting orientation sessions, and assisting with benefits enrollment.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records, ensuring compliance with company policies and regulations.
Process employee changes, including promotions, transfers, and terminations, in the HRIS system.
Support HR projects and initiatives, such as employee engagement programs and performance management processes.
Assist in the implementation and enforcement of HR policies and procedures.
Handle employee inquiries and escalate complex issues to the HR Manager as needed.
Prepare HR-related reports and presentations for management as required.
Ensure compliance with labor laws, regulations, and company policies in all HR-related activities.
Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive employee information with discretion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
